attributes.action: Allow entry into the UK of Locally Employed Iraqi Civilians that have worked alongside out troops in Iraq
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the withdraw of troops from Iraq becomes an approaching reality the plight of those who have worked alongside our troops must be addressed. It would be immoral to not offer sanctuary to those who are at risk for helping us. Thus any person who has worked in a role such as interpreter who will be at risk when we withdraw should be automatic offered residency for themselves  and their immediate families in the UK.
